Name: Grace
description:
Grace resides in a rural village in Yalu in Lae, Morobe Province. She is a smallholder farmer with an unwavering passion for agriculture. As a married woman, Grace has not only managed her household but has also devoted herself to nurturing her farming enterprise.

With years of hands-on farming experience, Grace has acquired valuable knowledge in cultivating the land and maximizing crop yields. Her dedication to sustainable farming practices has not only improved her productivity but also contributed to the preservation of the environment.

Grace seeks a loan to buy essential farm high-quality seeds and fertilizers. She will also buy wet cocoa beans in her village and the nearby villages.

With these resources she aims to further enhance her farms production capacity and ensure abundant harvests. Her remarkable commitment to agriculture, coupled with her years of farming experience, makes her a deserving candidate for financial support.

A special loan because it finances smallholder farmers to grow in their farming activity to add value to the economy.
